headline.main: SOVIETS MUST RELY MORE ON ASIA; Resources of the East Are Still Short of Full War Needs

lead_paragraph: Rolling slowly eastward across the plains of European Russia, the Nazi tide has already engulfed White Russia and two-thirds of the Ukraine. By these advances, the Germans have seized industrial areas of considerable importance and have taken up positions which threaten other Russian manufacturing and agricultural areas of the first magnitude.
abstract: supply sources in Ural Mts, Siberia and Asia discussed
